name: UpdateTemplate
description:
Update an existing template in PagerDuty.

Use this tool to update an existing template in PagerDuty. Suitable when modifications to a template are required.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the template to be updated.

parameters.name: template_type
parameters.description: The type of template. Only 'status_update' is supported.

value_schema.description: The type of template (`status_update` is the only supported template at this time)

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The name of the template to update in PagerDuty.

parameters.name: template_description
parameters.description: Provide a brief description of the template. This helps to explain its purpose and content.

parameters.name: email_subject
parameters.description: The subject of the email to be updated in the template.

parameters.name: email_body_html
parameters.description: The HTML content for the email body of the template.

value_schema.description: The HTML body of the e-mail message

parameters.name: short_message_template
parameters.description: The short message content for the template used in SMS, Push notifications, Slack, etc.

value_schema.description:
The short-message of the template (SMS, Push notification, Slack,
etc)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: template.template_type
parameters.description: The type of template (`status_update` is the only supported template at this time)

value_schema.description: The type of template (`status_update` is the only supported template at this time)

parameters.name: template.templated_fields.email_body
parameters.description: The HTML body of the e-mail message

value_schema.description: The HTML body of the e-mail message

parameters.name: template.templated_fields.message
parameters.description:
The short-message of the template (SMS, Push notification, Slack,
etc)

etc)
